channel.title: Help (easy just not sure)
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:11321) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:46) at server.run(server.java:151) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
fix..?

item.title: Help (easy just not sure)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

Not at all. I’m just wondering why you haven’t posted any more information. Solve it yourself if your so smart.

Read full topic

lmfao you think im a retard or some thing??

item.title: Help (easy just not sure)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

I was relating to the problem. If you don’t want help then don’t post in this forum, duh. All I am saying is to make sure that you didn’t define a number that is too large. If you are so sure that you’re smart and you can read errors, then you can just solve it yourself. I can see that kind of error happening if you changed the max players number higher than it already is.

If you are so good at reading errors, you would also realize that your error happens all the time in many different cases. Without providing more information, such as the last thing you changed, then noone can really help, can they?

They way that you worded your last post makes it sound like that you know what the problem is. If you do then you need to post what you think it is, because that error doesn’t tell much except where it vaguely occurred.

I can’t really help much further than this…

Read full topic

item.title: Help (easy just not sure)
item.dc:creator: @heathtech heathtech
item.description:
@heathtech wrote:

I got that kind of error when I tried to create a new array with the max of [100000][10][50]. I got it to go away by reducing it to [2700][5][10]. Since the error runs through the PlayerHandler, maybe it means that you have defined too many of something.

I kind of remember getting this error editing the item files, too.

Read full topic
